name: Knights With Guns (Radfish)
description:
Knights with guns is an old project I decided to remake! It's a top-down, wave-based shooter with all sorts of fun weapons and enemies! Every round you must pick up the crate in the center to continue. Every 5 rounds you are given a blue crate in which you get a random play upgrade/downgrade

update log:

- You died screen with a saveable high score
